**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Bellator Mortus Soldier](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2433) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 39 **Perception** +26 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +25, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +25, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +27, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +4 **Items** [_moderate sturdy shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=327) (Hardness 13^ HP 104^ BT 52), _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [half plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)_, [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (4), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [khopesh](/Weapons.aspx?ID=94)_, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42)_ --- **AC** 37 (39 with shield) **Fort** +29 **Ref** +23 **Will** +25 **HP** 345 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _khopesh_ +30 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 2d8+14 slashing **Melee** _shield spikes_ +30 ([attached to shield](/Traits.aspx?ID=171), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+14 piercing **Ranged** javelin +26 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+14 piercing **Battering Defense** The Bellator Mortus uses their shield as both a weapon and a defensive measure. Attempt a shield Strike. If the Strike hits, [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98). **Coordinated Assault** The Bellator Mortus acts as part of a well-trained unit. Their Strikes deal an additional 4d6 damage to creatures within reach of at least one of the Bellator Mortus's allies.
